questions.quote: George was scarfing shrimp at this meeting, and this guy says 'Hey, George, the ocean called. They're running outta shrimp.'
What're you talking about? You had a cheque bounce at the bodega.
Nuh! Okay Jerry, how about if Mike fixes your truuunk, we call it even, an' this way, nobody has to get hurt.
Why don't you just drop off some chicken skins and lobster shells.
No. No, I'll never cook again! Never! Now get out of my house!! Get out. Go.
I'm sure we're all aware of the flaws and biases of standardized tests..
Hey, hey, hey! It's not Lupe's fault, you shouldn't have left it out.
She's Romanian. What am I gonna talk to her about, Ceausescu?
I'm calling to let you know that Russell Dalrimple is no longer with this network.
See, the way I figure it, it's much easier to patch things up with Sheila than with the Soup Nazi.
